name: Zen Bloom
description:
[Zen Bloom uses Occulus VR and the DDR Dance Pad]

Relax and extend your limbs to reach each pose in VR, placing your feet on the dance pad and hands in the orbs. Meditate and breathe easy while each pose drives the building and blooming of your garden to relax you while extending the range of motion of your limbs to give therapeutic exercise to those going through physical therapy.
